title: Identify Offline EV Charging Station
description: A citizen reports that an EV charging station is not working. An operator needs to verify the status and dispatch a technician.

tasks.description: Identify the EV charging station by its ID or location from the citizen report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct charging station in the system.

tasks.description: Run a remote diagnostic on the charging station.
tasks.expected_outcome: The diagnostic tool returns a 'No Communication' error, confirming it is offline.

tasks.description: Create a work order for a maintenance technician to repair the station and update its status to 'Out of Service' on public maps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the work order and updates the public status.
